mapper.select: SELECT C_ID id, C_USERNAME username, C_CITY city, C_COUNTRY country, C_GENDER gender, C_IMAGE_URL imageUrl, C_POINT point, C_PROVINCE province, C_OPEN_ID openid FROM t_user WHERE C_OPEN_ID = #{openid};
SELECT C_ID id, C_USERNAME username, C_CITY city, C_COUNTRY country, C_GENDER gender, C_IMAGE_URL imageUrl, C_POINT point, C_PROVINCE province, C_OPEN_ID openid FROM t_user WHERE C_ID = #{id};

SELECT e.C_ID id, e.C_CONTENT content, e.C_PICTURE_URL pictureUrl, e.C_TITLE title, e.C_TYPE_ID typeId, e.C_EXPIRE_TIME expireTime, e.C_LIKE_COUNT likeCount, e.C_LOCATION location, e.C_COLLECT_COUNT collectCount, e.C_CREATE_TIME createTime, u.C_USERNAME publisherName, cd.C_NAME typeName FROM t_event e, t_user u, t_category_detail cd WHERE e.C_PUBLISHER_ID = u.C_ID AND e.C_TYPE_ID = cd.C_ID AND e.C_PUBLISHER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT e.C_ID id, e.C_CONTENT content, e.C_PICTURE_URL pictureUrl, e.C_TITLE title, e.C_TYPE_ID typeId, e.C_EXPIRE_TIME expireTime, e.C_LIKE_COUNT likeCount, e.C_LOCATION location, e.C_COLLECT_COUNT collectCount, e.C_CREATE_TIME createTime, u.C_USERNAME publisherName, cd.C_NAME typeName FROM t_event e, t_user u, t_category_detail cd WHERE e.C_PUBLISHER_ID = u.C_ID AND e.C_TYPE_ID = cd.C_ID AND exists(SELECT C_EVENT_ID FROM t_event_att et WHERE et.C_ATTEND_USER_ID = #{userId} AND e.C_ID = et.C_event_id)
